title: Eternal Tides
description: Amidst the salt-soaked breezes of the open sea, a remarkable discovery of a lost diary catapults treasure hunter, Ethan Forde, on the trail of lost riches and an otherworldly power.With help from his seasoned mentor Mac and an intrepid historian named Kate, Ethan embarks on a perilous journey that will pit him against foes driven by greed, whose obsession with power knows no bounds.Unbeknown to them all, beneath the fa√ßade of an uncharted tropical paradise lies a realm of unspeakable horrors.In this thrilling tale of legends and avarice, the lines blur between treasure and torment, and fate casts its long shadow over all who dare to traverse the Eternal Tides!
author: Marc Bright
